availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Bernard McAtee (Louisville, Kentucky, contractor and grocer)

body.p: Louisville, Kentucky, contractor and grocer. Native of Ireland. Married to Julia Keagan McAtee in Louisville, Kentucky, on September 7, 1861. Father of Minnie McAtee. Contractor in Louisville, Kentucky, in 1861. Grocer in partnership with Bernard E. Casselly in Louisville in 1865.

ab.bibl:
Tenth Manuscript Census of the United States (1880), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Jefferson County, Louisville, District 136, p. 62A.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Jefferson County Marriages, Film 000482709.
Kentucky Birth, Marriage and Death Records (1852-1910), KDLA, Frankfort, KY, Roll 994041, Jefferson County Deaths.
Edwards' Annual Director to the Inhabitants, Institutions, Incorporated Companies, Manufacturing Establishments, Business firms, Etc., Etc., in the City of Louisville, For 1865-6 (Louisville: Edwards, Greenough & Deved, 1866), 241, 416.
